pages.text: $(li)The Soul Sand Valley is a biome composed of mostly Soul Sand and Soul Soil.$(br)$(li)It can be found in the Nether.$(br)$(li)You can find here Buried Bones and Bone Blocks.$(br)$(li)Some dangerous creatures such as $(l:patchouli:creatures/infernal_expansion/embody)Embodies$(/l) and $(l:patchouli:creatures/quark/wraith)Wraiths$(/l) can be found here too.
$(li)You can search this biome by typing the words $(l)Soul Sand Valley$() in the search box of the Nature's Compass.
